alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Traning thunderstorm will impact portions of central Duval County through 500 PM EDT... At 418 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near Oceanway, or near Jacksonville International Arpt, moving south at 10 mph. Affected area has received about 1 to 2 inches of rainfall. Storm could bring another 0.5 to 1 inch of rainfall. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Oceanway and Tallyrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
